    @allure.title("Test to verify that branching rules added to show parameters works as expected during execution "
                  "with recurrence")
    @allure.description("This testcase tests if branching rules added on single select dropdown parameter to show the "
                        "parameters works as expected during execution with recurrence")
    @allure.link("https://app.clickup.com/t/86cvva640")
    @pytest.mark.scenario
    @pytest.mark.job
    @pytest.mark.task_recurrence_execution
    @pytest.mark.test_branching_rule_to_show_hidden_parameters_with_recurrence
    @pytest.mark.parametrize("job_execution_by, users_list", [("user", [Env.get_env_data("QA_PUBLISHER_USERNAME_01")]),
                                                              ("user_group", [])])
    def test_branching_rule_to_show_hidden_parameters_with_recurrence(self, user_group_creation, job_execution_by,
                                                                      users_list):
        process_data = self.recurrence_obj.test_add_branching_rule_in_single_select_dropdown_parameter_to_show_hidden_parameters_with_recurrence()
        login(Env.get_env_data("QA_PUBLISHER_USERNAME_01"), Env.get_env_data("QA_PUBLISHER_PASSWORD_01"))
        select_facility(const.FACILITY_NAME)
        select_usecase(const.USECASE_NAME)
        self.job_obj.assign_user_and_user_group_to_process(job_execution_by, users_list, user_group_creation,
                                                           all_task_assignmnet=True)
        self.job_obj.create_job()
        self.job_obj.start_job()
        self.job_obj.start_task(task_name_01, recurrence=True)
        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_01, process_data["single_dropdown_param"],
                                       data={"value": "sunday"})
        if self.job_obj.validate_if_parameter_is_hidden(task_name_01, process_data["sign_param"]):
            raise AssertionError(
                "The parameter " + process_data["sign_param"] + " is not shown as per the branching rules defined")
    
        if self.job_obj.validate_if_parameter_is_hidden(task_name_01, process_data["single_line_param"]):
            raise AssertionError(
                "The parameter " + process_data[
                    "single_line_param"] + "is not shown as per the branching rules defined")
        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_01, process_data["image_param"], data=None)
        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_01, process_data["sign_param"], data=None)
        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_01, process_data["single_line_param"], data={"value": "qwerty"})
        self.job_obj.complete_task(task_name_01, recurrence=True, continue_recurrence=True)
    
        new_recurrence_data = self.job_obj.poll_stage_data(job_id=const.JOB_ID, stage_name=stage_name_01)
        self.job_obj.assert_task_execution_type(new_recurrence_data, 1, "RECURRING")
    
        self.job_obj.start_task(task_name_01, recurrence=True, recurrence_start_reason="Test_recurrence")
        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_01, process_data["single_dropdown_param"],
                                       data={"value": "sunday"})
        if self.job_obj.validate_if_parameter_is_hidden(task_name_01, process_data["sign_param"]):
            raise AssertionError(
                "The parameter " + process_data["sign_param"] + " is not shown as per the branching rules defined")
    
        if self.job_obj.validate_if_parameter_is_hidden(task_name_01, process_data["single_line_param"]):
            raise AssertionError(
                "The parameter " + process_data["single_line_param"] + "is not shown as per the branching rules "
                                                                       "defined")
        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_01, process_data["image_param"], data=None)
        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_01, process_data["sign_param"], data=None)
        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_01, process_data["single_line_param"], data={"value": "qwerty"})
